name: Humbug
message: Who's there? Go away, I'm sleeping!

name: Ghost of Yesterday
message: It's the Ghost of Yesterday. Hi!

name: Humbug
message: Bah! I know this story. I've been unkind. I get it.

name: Ghost of Yesterday
message: Nah, I don't care about that. I'm here to remind you...

name: Ghost of Yesterday
message: ...about your laundry! You left socks in the dryer.

name: Humbug
message: I'm trying to sleep! Who is it now?

name: Ghost of Today
message: It's me, the Ghost of Today!

name: Ghost of Today
message: There's a holiday sale on fruit cake. TODAY ONLY!

name: Humbug
message: Dried fruit dessert! My favourite! Thank you, ghost!

name: Humbug
message: Now to enjoy this dried fruit delicacy in peace...

note: Ghost of Tomorrow steps out of the shadows.

name: Humbug
message: Ghost, are you here to show me my future?

note: Ghost snatches Humbug's fruitcake and runs away

name: Humbug
message: BAH! My fruitcake! Come back, thief!

name: Humbug
message: And everyone wonders why I'm so grumpy!

name: Director
message: 5 minute call, actors to the stage.

name: Director
message: Let's take it from the top!
